About me

Hello, I'm Filip Hiker, an aspiring junior JS/TS developer with a strong passion for web development. My journey in the world of coding began with curiosity and an eagerness to create interactive and engaging web experiences. It has since evolved into a love for JS/TS, front-end development, and building web applications that make a difference. My fascination with web technologies has led me to explore modern frameworks and libraries, and I'm excited to stay on the cutting edge of the ever-evolving JS/TS landscape. I believe in the power of clean, efficient, and maintainable code to transform ideas into reality. I'm always eager to connect with fellow developers, learn from their experiences, and embrace new challenges in the ever-exciting world of web development.
